\n
Job Type: Contract
\n
Job Category: IT
\n
\n
\n
Job Title:
Business Analyst with Banking Domain
Location:
NYC, NY (Hybrid)
Contract
\n
\n
\n
Job Summary:
\n
\n
\n  We are seeking a skilled
Business Analyst (BA)
with strong experience in the
Payments domain
and deep understanding of
Banking and Financial Services
. The ideal candidate should have a good understanding of
payment processing systems
with the ability to bridge the gap between business needs and technical implementation. Java knowledge is preferred to effectively collaborate with development teams.\n
\n
\n
\n
Key Responsibilities:
\n
\n
\n
\n   Gather and analyze business requirements from stakeholders in the Payments and Banking domain.\n
\n
\n   Translate business needs into functional and non-functional specifications.\n
\n
\n   Work closely with product owners, developers, QA, and other stakeholders to ensure requirements are understood and implemented correctly.\n
\n
\n   Document business processes, use cases, user stories, and acceptance criteria.\n
\n
\n   Analyze and support the implementation of payment systems like SWIFT, SEPA, RTGS, ACH, etc.\n
\n
\n   Understand APIs and assist in drafting API specifications and user flows.\n
\n
\n   Perform impact analysis, data mapping, and system integration planning.\n
\n
\n   Collaborate with development teams, especially Java developers, to ensure accurate delivery of business requirements.\n
\n
\n   Participate in UAT and system validation to ensure requirements are met.\n
\n
\n   Support production issue analysis and provide business solutions.\n
\n
\n
\n
Required Skills
\n
BUSINESS CONTINUITY ANALYST
\n
DATA ANALYST
\n
